t: Amazon.com: Ready to Eat Meals 3 Pack Military, Emergency Food ...
s: It's an MRE, what do you want? Fair priced, has inspection dates. I ate 2 of these just to test. The Mexican chicken stew is on point. The elbow macaroni in tomato is gross. Again, the seller is on point. To be fair I've had name brand microwave dinners and they were way worse tasting.

t: Amazon.com: MRE (Meals-Ready-To-Eat) Case-Inspection 11/2022 or Better-ACM MRE Case (Case A) : Sports & Outdoors
s: MREs do not have an expiration date. They have an inspection date and a pack date. The Inspection date is three years after the pack date, and the inspection date is the date the Military inspects the cases during long term storage to verify they are still fit for consumption.
